name: Shepherd (Knewaccount)
description:
SHEPHERD!

Weekly Game Jam 139 - Theme: Followers!

Play as a shepherd who must return his sheep back home!

Protect your precious sheep from the wolves.

Z = throw stick

X = follow/stop follow

Be careful of the wolves in sheep clothing. They lure sheep in!

Wolves love to play fetch! So throw sticks to keep them away from your sheep!
